pkgmetadata.longdescription: Continuous-Time Movement Modeling // Functions for identifying, fitting, and applying continuous-space, continuous-time stochastic movement models to animal tracking data. The package is described in Calabrese Fleming (2016) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12559 and its methods are based on those introduced in Fleming et al (2014) doi:10.1086/675504, Fleming et al (2014) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12176, Fleming et al (2015) doi:10.1890/14-2010.1, Fleming et al (2016) doi:10.1890/15-1607, Pron Fleming et al (2016) doi:10.1186/s40462-016-0084-7, Fleming Calabrese (2016) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.12673, Pron et al (2017) doi:10.1002/ecm.1260, Fleming et al (2017) doi:10.1016/j.ecoinf.2017.04.008, Fleming et al (2018) doi:10.1002/eap.1704, and Winner Noonan et al (2018) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13027.
